statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf "\033[2m%s \033[36m%s \033[35m(%s)\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$branch"; else printf "\033[2m%s \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$model" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi
